Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.service

Class PlayerService

java.lang.Object
com.IGallinari.LastGame.service.PlayerService
@Service public class PlayerService extends Object
Service class for managing player-related operations. Includes functionalities such as building responses for player details, comparisons, and filters.

  • Method Details

    • buildPlayerTeamFilterResponse

      public PlayerTeamFilterResponse buildPlayerTeamFilterResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idTeam, int season)
      Builds a response for player-team filter based on the given request.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request containing the user's token.
      idTeam - The ID of the team to filter players.
      season - The season for which to filter the players.
      Returns:
      A PlayerTeamFilterResponse with the filtered player information.

    • buildPlayerDetailsByGameResponse

      public PlayerDetailsByGameResponse buildPlayerDetailsByGameResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idGame, int idPlayer)
      Builds a response with player details for a specific game.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request containing the user's token.
      idGame - The ID of the game.
      idPlayer - The ID of the player.
      Returns:
      A PlayerDetailsByGameResponse with the player's game details.

    • buildCompareFilterResponse

      public PlayerFilterResponse buildCompareFilterResponse()
      Builds a response for player filter comparison.
      Returns:
      A PlayerFilterResponse containing team and role filter options.

    • buildDetailsPlayerIndependentByGameResponse

      public PlayerDetailsResponse buildDetailsPlayerIndependentByGameResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idPlayer, int season)
      Builds a response with player details for a specific season.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request containing the user's token.
      idPlayer - The ID of the player.
      season - The season for which to retrieve player details.
      Returns:
      A PlayerDetailsResponse with the player's details for the given season.

    • buildComparePlayersResponse

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> buildComparePlayersResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idPlayer1, int idPlayer2, int season)
      Builds a response for comparing two players.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request containing the user's token.
      idPlayer1 - The ID of the first player.
      idPlayer2 - The ID of the second player.
      season - The season for which to compare the players.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with a ComparePlayersResponse if logged in, otherwise a NeedToBeLoggedResponse.
